section.heading: County laboratories; bills and accounts; payment

content.p:
ยง 528. County laboratories; bills and accounts; payment. 1. Unless
otherwise provided by law, the director or other person in charge of
each laboratory shall certify all bills and accounts including salaries
and wages, and transmit them to the board of supervisors of the county
which shall provide for their payment in the same manner as other
charges against the county.
 2. The board of supervisors of a county not having a purchasing agent
may make an appropriation for the maintenance of such laboratory and
direct the county treasurer to pay all bills, accounts, salaries and
wages which are approved by the director of the laboratory within the
amount of such appropriation, subject to such regulations as to the
payment and audit thereof as the board of supervisors may deem proper.
